original_definition: 'computer display' means an electronic display intended for one person for close viewing such as in a desk based environment;
generated_definition: 'computer display' means a device that displays information generated by a computer and allows the user to interact with the computer through a graphical user interface.

Article 2: ‘monitor’ or ‘computer monitor’ or ‘computer display’ means an electronic display intended for one person for close viewing such as in a desk based environment;
‘monitor’ or ‘computer monitor’ or ‘computer display’ means anelectronic display intended for one person for close viewing such as in a desk based environment;
Article 11: confirmation that theelectronic displayprioritises thecomputer display power management protocols set out in point 6.2.3 of Annex II of Commission Regulation (EU) No 617/2013 (1). Any deviation from the protocols should be reported;

confirmation that the electronic display prioritises the computer display power management protocols set out in point 6.2.3 of Annex II of Commission Regulation (EU) No 617/2013 (1). Any deviation from the protocols should be reported;
